channel.title: Sphynx-Scape with 6 ALL NEW CHARACTER CLASSES.!
channel.description:
Sphynx-Scape is back! and that means it's time for us to kick off our 1st update - Class items! Class items are special items, designed on how you battle.
DL link:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?y5mbnpau29edag4]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?y5mbnpau29edag4[/url]
Only has claws/ags, none of that Korasi bull. PKing is straight forward and beautiful. Also, there is a PK'ing level, for those hardcore people who just love to whipe the floor with everyone!
----------------------------------------------------- SCROLL DOWN FOR SPECIAL EVENT -----------------------------------------------------
There are 6 different classes so far:
Tactician - High attack rating Berserker - Less defence, high strength rating Mage - High magic rating Paladin - Good defence, good prayer bonus Archer - High range rating Defender - Great defence rating, less strength
Each class item is color coordinated, For example, the Berserker's cape: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=553856.0;attach=21405;image[/img]
Red: Berserker items Green: Archer items Blue: Tactician items Cyan: Defender items Yellow: Paladin items White: Mage items
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- C L A S S R O L L S - S P H Y N X - S C A P E - -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- The Roles:
Defender (Tank): Obviously, you want your guy that's decked out in defender gear to snag the main boss that you're fighting, and keep alive while other people attack. Paladin (Off-Tank): Without sacking damage, Paladins will have a much easier time taking on multiple enemies because of their increased prayer bonus (Protection prayers are very effective against groups, but their def isn't strong enough for mobs that hit through). Berserker (DPS): Increased STR, although their def is hugely in the negative, and if they have mobs on them, they're likely to die. Their main goal is to ATTACK ATTACK ATTACK, while hopefully going un-noticed. Tactician (DPS): A very precise warrior, making sure that he scores not only hits, but maximum hits as much as possible. They'd be best attacking the boss, and fending off a few add mobs. Archer (DPS): An archer will be best prepared for ranged combat, getting himself out of harmsway during big battles. Mage (DPS-Healing): A mages job is to help keep the tank alive (With lunar magic), or damage the hell out of what ever it is they're killing.
If the class is pitted in PvP, however... ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Defenders will try and outlast their opponents, by blocking hits and scoring some decent damage. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Tacticians will hope to combo their opponents to death, not allowing them a chance to eat or run. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Berserkers will attempt to finish off their foes quickly, hoping to avoid blows. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Paladins will strike at the opponents prayer, while boasting prayer bonus and defence. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Mages will try to go after melee masters, such as defenders and tacticians, killing them with stuns and confusion. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Archers will hope to get the element of surprise, and kill their foes before they know what hit em'. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DL link:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?y5mbnpau29edag4[/url]
Enjoy, ;)Foot
Edit: How to run 1. Go to your Sphynx-Scape folder 2. Right click "Play Sphynx-Scape" 3. Click "edit" 4. Replace the word Java with "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\bin\Java.exe", or whatever your directory to Java is.
------------------------------------------------------------------- Special Returning Event!! ------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st event, Post for glory (completed)
the first two people to post in THIS thread will get - 1x Dragon Claws 1x Class Cape
2nd event, be the first!
The first two people to log into the updated server will get! 1x Torva set 1x Armadyl Godsword
Ready... Set... POST! ... and log :D
DL link:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?y5mbnpau29edag4[/url]
--------- P.S --------- Having client errors? please post what your issue is and I may be able to help you solve it!

item.dc:creator: @TheFoot TheFoot
item.description:
@TheFoot wrote:

Server down for 3 days.

Some hackers are trying to steal our class item boss drop tables, models, etc.

estimated time until the server returns: 3 says.

item.title: Sphynx-Scape with 6 ALL NEW CHARACTER CLASSES.!
item.dc:creator: @TheFoot TheFoot
item.description:
@TheFoot wrote:

TheHolyGrail:

How does training work on here if theres classes? I’m a bit confused.

Training is normal, it is still RuneSape.

Classes aren’t precisely enforced, there are simply class items.
However, obviously a person in full cyan (defender) gear is only going to be used for defence, and will claim to be a defender, whereas a person in full red (berserker) gear is going to be a berserker.

Read full topic

item.title: Sphynx-Scape with 6 ALL NEW CHARACTER CLASSES.!
item.dc:creator: @TheFoot TheFoot
item.description:
@TheFoot wrote:

Certainly, each class is very unique in its own right, and each are more than needed to take down some of the bosses I laid out (over 1m hp and 750 max hit).

Please check the original post.

I’ve fixed the client issue with Sphynx Scape, please download it again.

And congratz Kingman002 on your class cape and D claws.
Now, what’s your IGN going to be?

Read full topic

item.title: Sphynx-Scape with 6 ALL NEW CHARACTER CLASSES.!
item.dc:creator: @TheFoot TheFoot
item.description:
@TheFoot wrote:

Sphynx-Scape is back! and that means it’s time for us to kick off our 1st update - Class items!
Class items are special items, designed on how you battle.

DL link:http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?y5mbnpau29edag4

Only has claws/ags, none of that Korasi bull. PKing is straight forward and beautiful. Also, there is a PK’ing level, for those hardcore people who just love to whipe the floor with everyone!

SCROLL DOWN FOR SPECIAL EVENT

There are 6 different classes so far:

Tactician - High attack rating
Berserker - Less defence, high strength rating
Mage - High magic rating
Paladin - Good defence, good prayer bonus
Archer - High range rating
Defender - Great defence rating, less strength

Each class item is color coordinated,
For example, the Berserker’s cape:

Red: Berserker items
Green: Archer items
Blue: Tactician items
Cyan: Defender items
Yellow: Paladin items
White: Mage items

C L A S S R O L L S - S P H Y N X - S C A P E -

The Roles:

Defender (Tank): Obviously, you want your guy that’s decked out in defender gear to snag the main boss that you’re fighting, and keep alive while other people attack.
Paladin (Off-Tank): Without sacking damage, Paladins will have a much easier time taking on multiple enemies because of their increased prayer bonus (Protection prayers are very effective against groups, but their def isn’t strong enough for mobs that hit through).
Berserker (DPS): Increased STR, although their def is hugely in the negative, and if they have mobs on them, they’re likely to die. Their main goal is to ATTACK ATTACK ATTACK, while hopefully going un-noticed.
Tactician (DPS): A very precise warrior, making sure that he scores not only hits, but maximum hits as much as possible. They’d be best attacking the boss, and fending off a few add mobs.
Archer (DPS): An archer will be best prepared for ranged combat, getting himself out of harmsway during big battles.
Mage (DPS-Healing): A mages job is to help keep the tank alive (With lunar magic), or damage the hell out of what ever it is they’re killing.

If the class is pitted in PvP, however…

Defenders will try and outlast their opponents, by blocking hits and scoring some decent damage.

Tacticians will hope to combo their opponents to death, not allowing them a chance to eat or run.

Berserkers will attempt to finish off their foes quickly, hoping to avoid blows.

Paladins will strike at the opponents prayer, while boasting prayer bonus and defence.

Mages will try to go after melee masters, such as defenders and tacticians, killing them with stuns and confusion.

Archers will hope to get the element of surprise, and kill their foes before they know what hit em’.

DL link:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?y5mbnpau29edag4[/url]

Enjoy,
;)Foot

Edit: How to run

  1. Go to your Sphynx-Scape folder
  2. Right click “Play Sphynx-Scape”
  3. Click “edit”
  4. Replace the word Java with “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\bin\Java.exe”, or whatever your directory to Java is.

Special Returning Event!!

1st event, Post for glory (completed)

the first two people to post in THIS thread will get -
1x Dragon Claws
1x Class Cape

2nd event, be the first!

The first two people to log into the updated server will get!
1x Torva set
1x Armadyl Godsword

Ready…
Set…
POST! … and log

DL link:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?y5mbnpau29edag4[/url]

P.S

Having client errors? please post what your issue is and I may be able to help you solve it!

Read full topic
